snippet: City officials estimate that more than 740,000 visitors came from China in 2014, almost five times as many as in 2009 and passing France to place fourth as a source of foreign tourists, behind Britain, Canada and Brazil, Patrick McGeehan reports.
abstract: City officials estimate that more than 740,000 visitors came from China in 2014, almost five times as many as in 2009 and passing France to place fourth as a source of foreign tourists, behind Britain, Canada and Brazil, Patrick McGeehan reports.

headline.main: New York City Awaits More Chinese Visitors
